/mnt/mldonkey_completed.description: Choose a Share for MLDonkey Downloaded data. Provide room enough for finished downloads.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run MLDonkey with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step. MUST be 2001 right now!!!!
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to run MLDonkey with. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step. MUST be 2001 right now!!!
PGID.label: GID

MLDONKEY_CLIENT_NAME.description: Enter a name for your client in ED2K Network
MLDONKEY_CLIENT_NAME.label: Client Name

MLDONKEY_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Enter a password for the main user 'admin'. Default will be empty, should be changed
MLDONKEY_ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Admin Password

MLDonkey.description: MLDonkey client for eMule, Bittorrent, Filetransfer and many more P2P networks.
MLDonkey.more_info:
Default MLDonkey Admin username is admin

If you change ANY port you MUST change them by hand in the server too!!!!

Create a user mldonkey with uid&gid 2001 matching the uid&gid provided in the setup. For the time being you MUST use 2001 as both!!!
